content:
Don't bother looking at me for directions when you're lost,
'cause just like you,
I'm always on the move! Tee-hee-hee~!

There can't be two identical martial arts manuals in this world,
so—you're the one I saw before!

So, you're offering me a brand~new~ paradise!
And there's no admission fee?
I can't believe such wonderful things exist in this world!
【Test】Oh right, here you go

[Test] Oh~! You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

Gahahahaha~!
So you're saying,
I'll have a fixed sleeping spot every day?
Oh? Alright, go ahead.

No, no, that won't do.
I need to find clues about where the martial arts manual is hidden.
Perhaps our paths will cross again!

Thank you for the invitation,
It's not that your offer isn't tempting,
I just haven't had my fill of hometown scenery yet.

After getting used to waking up not knowing where I am,
I might need some time
to adjust to having a regular pillow.

Some say the meaning of travel is
meeting different people and then saying goodbye to them,
but now I think there's something special about always meeting the same person.

I'm just spacing out here.
While "since I'm already here" is a common principle,
I really don't have anything to do.

[Test] Fancy meeting you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync.

【Test】Fancy meeting you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync!
[Test] Look, this is it.

Life's too short to miss out on beautiful scenes and moments.
That's why I'm not rushing home to pack—
I haven't finished exploring this place yet.

Looking at our current situation,
the most direct way to improve our martial arts is—
to slice through everything in our path!

Shh.
I'm on the hunt for mysterious oddities.
Talk to you later.

Trends go in circles,
Magazines show the same old content over and over,
But you're different - you make me feel fresh curiosity.

I may have ended up here by accident,
but since I'm already here, might as well make the most of it!
That's, umm... kind of my life philosophy.

Every encounter with nature
is an exchange of hearts and breath... {短暂停}breath?
Oh, it's you who's here. Hello there.

...(thinking)
To run into you again today...?
What a coincidence.

Meeting you time and time again,
I don't think you're an ordinary person,
And yet, you look so... normal.
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~

I guess there's no reason to refuse...
So the conclusion is—I'm convinced!
<size=64>Let's go! Onward—</size>

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

【Test】Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

Lobster Fist—
Oh, it's you.

Big treasures, little treasures,
Hiding gems, shy gems, gems I've yet to meet,
Let me see where you might be...

<size=30>Being here all alone,
           I'm about to lose my mind.</size>
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync!
[Test] Oh right, this is for you
【Test】Oh right, this is for you
[Test] Look, this is it.
[Test] Look, this is it.
[Test] Look, this is it.

Still hanging around here?
Well then, why don't we get lost together!

It's you, it's you, all these surprises are you,
This time's surprise was meeting you by chance,
As for the surprise of an invitation - let's save that for next time.

Hush.
That insect that just flew away must have been affected by supernatural phenomena.
Need something? If not, keep your distance.

Oh, got hit in the shoulder by some weird supernatural thing.
Not broken, just healing up.
Need something?

Nice to meet you! This is how we say hello in the Jelly World.
I'm a talking jelly,
And well, as you can see.

Oh, it's you! We've bumped into each other so many times,
I can recognize you now!
Though I still can't remember your name...
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】Oh right, this is for you
[Test] Here you go

Camera, brush, sketchbook and destination,
I still don't know which way to go next,
Now, {短暂停}could you draw me a map to your home?

There are two ways to measure the world with your feet: traveling and taking walks.
I choose to take walks while enjoying the scenery.
Would you like to join me?

Meeting again?
Or am I lost again?

Aha! I get it! You keep talking to me because
you want to know where the secret martial arts manual is hidden!
Too bad—I don't know either.

It's important to maintain an actor's mystique.
There's this old showbiz saying:
The more exposure you get, the less fresh you become.

Thanks for trying to lead me back,
but this time I'm committed to staying lost.

...
Me and the fish,
We never gave you permission to come close.

Are you here to dig up some work?
Aw, if I reveal the mystery of bug catching now,
there won't be any surprises left!

Even though I thought that,
I still prepared myself
for the possibility of someone coming.
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
[Test] Oh right, this is for you

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync with each other.

Before heading back to pack,
I've got to break all the rocks around here!
Let's go, Bhan-bhan!

Before I move in with you,
I still have some things to take care of,
like... dealing with those who won't behave.
Hey there, Bhan~ Need something?

Perfect timing, my eyes could use a break.
Sometimes it's nice to step out of the script like this
and take a stroll in the real world.

*Yaaawn!*
*Streeetch!*
Oh, hello there.

So if you're looking for someone 
to do fun activities with around here,
feel free to count me in!
Frostia
[Test] Hm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to meet anyone else here.

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

After careful deliberation and considering all factors,
plus to prove that I'm not some directionally-challenged dummy,
I've decided to go along with you!

<size=30>Could they be a rival disciple coming to steal our martial arts secrets?
But wait... I don't think the Lobster School has any rivals to begin with?</size>

Your outfit looks so lovely,
I couldn't help but take a second look.
Hi, I'm Medowlyn, I hope I didn't make you uncomfortable.
Hm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to meet anyone else here.
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~

There might be all sorts of reasons,
but I like how hard you're trying to convince me.
It's quite amusing.

Is there anything I can help you with?
I'm not great at being a tour guide though,
It's my first time here too, so I don't know my way around.

I can be too impulsive sometimes.
It's better to have some quiet time alone.

Almost... just a little more, Bhan!
It got scared away...
You really didn't do that on purpose?

Whoa—Uwah! It's you!
I was just about to throw away my insect net and unleash my secret martial art technique,
Guess that showdown will have to wait for next time. (slightly disappointed)

Ah—! I-it's you—!
P-p-pardon me!
Hey there, lost your way too?

Have we met before?
Sorry, I'm face-blind.
Gems of different colors are much easier to tell apart.

Failed to exchange contact information. Please check.
(In Testing)
[Test] Compania registration successful. You can now view it in Compania.

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync with each other.

Today's happiness wasn't from the distant mountains or gentle breeze,
it was from you.
No wonder I couldn't help but steal a second glance when I first saw you.
[Test] Oh right, here you go.

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

You look kinda familiar...
Sorry, I'm not good at remembering names that aren't gemstones.
Need something?

I-Is that you?!
<size=30>I was just reaching the seventh level of "Immovable as Mountain"!
I hope stopping here won't make me go berserk...</size>

You came at just the right time. I was testing
who would give up first - me or the fish.
Thank you for giving me a reason to let go.

Oh, it's you.
Surprisingly,
I've found another sane person.

Hehehe~he,
Looks like you're quite curious about me.
So am I.
Exchange Contact Info
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】Oh right, here you go
[Test] Look, this is it.

I rarely talk this much with people I've just met,
but you're different,
Grandma always says it's not very nice to ignore someone's greeting.

...(thinking)
About your invitation...
Oh, I need to deal with some unruly ones first.

Oh, I guess this could also describe how fresh fish stays.
Gotta hurry home to keep the fish fresh when you catch it! Wait a sec,
how did we end up on this topic again?

Hmm... it flew away.
Did you see how beautiful the colors were?
What color was it? I didn't get a good look.

I fell asleep after the performance,
And somehow drifted here along the chaotic currents,
Though it wasn't where I meant to go, I think I'll stay here.

Even though I'm to-ta-lly confused about what's going on,
I should still say this.
<size=64>Nice to meet you!</size>

Hehehe~ Got you, didn't I?
It's not some jelly glue,
I'm Lauffie, an actor from the amusement park.

I'm a bit embarrassed, probably just tired from the performance.
Waking up in unfamiliar places when I open my eyes...
It happens to me quite often.

They say meetings are destiny's accidents,
But don't you think we're running into each other a bit too often?
Oh, or maybe it's just because this place is so small.
【Test】Hm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.

[Test] What a coincidence meeting you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync.

...Oh, I'm gathering materials,
To fix up my car,
There might be turbulence on my way to moving in with you.

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync!

Ah~! You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.{M_LookAtMe}

I just heard a strange noise...
Oh? You're still here.

Hehe, did my Lobster Fist catch your eye?
Want me to "show you the ropes"?
Sorry, no can do! Our school's martial arts are strictly confidential.

Secret Technique—"Speed Reading Mastery"!
Huh? When did that post get there?!
You... didn't see anything just now, right?

"Dig a hole~ add some soil,
Count one-two-three-four-five~"
Oh, hello there. I didn't expect to see anyone else here?

So...
I didn't mean to scare you.
If anything, I was waiting for you to surprise me!

I'm standing here enjoying the view,
And in this view, I see someone else enjoying it too,
Hello there, nice to see you again.
【Test】Receive a Star Badge to invite companions to settle in Starcove.
[Test] Oh right, here you go.

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync!
[Test] Look, this is it.

Pardon me,
I need to clear my mind and reflect on
the martial techniques I've learned along this journey.

Mr. Shi went to the market to watch lions.
The stone den was damp, so he had his servant wipe it...
And then... my t-tongue got all twisted!

There seems to be some mysterious force
Making our paths cross again and again...
Could this be a secret sign left by some hidden master?
See you.

Hm? Didn't expect to run into someone else here.
(In Testing)
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to meet anyone else here.

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync with each other.
【Test】Oh right, this is for you

I need to figure something out,
Sneak back and pack up all my precious treasures,
Then zoom away like a ninja!

[Test] What a coincidence meeting you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync with each other.
[Test] Here you go

Oh, before I move in with you,
I'll make sure there aren't any
spooky supernatural things around here.

Sounds like a whole new experience compared to just crashing anywhere for a nap! Hehehe~
I can't wait to try it!

Bhan, the fish got away!
Are you working for those fish?

This one isn't as effective as the last one.
It's been ten minutes and I'm still not sleepy.
Oh, hello there.

We meet again, how interesting!
I'm actually quite happy to see you...
Could it be... are you some kind of new gem?!

Well then, from this moment on,
We're "almost-neighbors," right?
Let's try it out - almost-neighbor? Almost-neighbor?

Actually, when I was feeling bored earlier,
I was just playing cards by myself~!
Oh, I know! How about I add you as a new character?

Oh, I'm just checking if the area is safe.
Need something?

I left my "Guide to Drama" here somewhere,
What a shame, I was planning to use it as a pillow—
After all, I'm more about experiencing things than reading about them.

Gahahahaha~ga!
Seems like you don't know me well enough yet,
So let's walk forward together, appreciating each other along the way.

Looking for answers in this world I roam,
There's still so much scenery here I've yet to see,
So could we perhaps save your invitation for another time?

You're still here?
It's not safe here, you should leave.
Oh, I don't have time to worry about you.

One, two, three and away we go, practice makes perfect—
Hey, want to learn how to warm up too?
[Test] Failed to collect Star Badge

[Test] Hm? So direct?
Well, I guess there's nothing wrong with that...
(Testing)
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
[Test] Look, this is it.

You know how in wuxia novels there's always secret martial arts manuals hidden behind the master's mountain?
This place looks just like those mountains, so I thought I'd...
Wait a second—who are you?

Since we meet again-gain-gain-gain,
That must mean—
Destiny is just one big crop circle?!
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
[Test] Look, this is it.

【Test】Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

【Test】Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.{M_LookAtMe}

So, did you find a game that's good for two?
How about we play cards?
What do you say to a card game?

Just checking if there's anything wrong with this book I picked up, see if it needs to be dealt with.
Oh, nothing for now.
Did you need something?

Well, look who it is!
"Destiny" doesn't even begin to explain our chance meetings anymore.
I guess the world really is a small bubble after all!
[Test] Oh right, here you go.

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.
